data.text: Yahweh, I will praise you with all of my inner being.
I will sing to celebrate what you [MTY], who are much greater than all other gods, have done.
When my enemies realize that you are very powerful,
You sat on your throne to judge people,
You rebuked the people of other nations
Our enemies have disappeared;
But Yahweh rules forever.
and he will judge all the people in [SYN] the world justly;
Yahweh will be a refuge for those who are oppressed;
Those who know Yahweh [MTY] trust in him;
Yahweh rules from Zion Hill;
He does not forget to punish those who have murdered others;
Yahweh, be merciful to me!
I want to live in order that I can praise you at the gates of Jerusalem [MTY]
It is as though the wicked people of many nations have dug a pit for me to fall into [MET],
Because of what you have done, people know that you decide matters fairly/justly,
Wicked people will all die and be buried in their graves,
But you will not forget those who are needy/poor;
Yahweh, arise and judge the wicked people of the nations;
Yahweh, teach them to be terrified about you.
